description: Phase that performs bulk receipt of materials from a purchase order using a specified equipment class.
intent: To record the bulk receipt of materials against a purchase order and update equipment status grids accordingly.

inputs.Equipment Class: Valid equipment class for bulk receipt

side_effects: Saves a check-status equipment state grid starting at index 6000
Saves a set-status equipment state grid starting at index 5000
example_usage: Operator selects the purchase order, enters the equipment class, executes the bulk receipt phase, and the system records the received materials and updates the equipment grids.
